content: AG 5D-22 Cordless angle grinder (5”) Cordless brushless angle grinder with dead mans switch for everyday cutting and grinding with discs up to 5 (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Grinders and sanders- - - ### FEATURES:Features Compact, cordless 5 angle grinder for everyday cutting and grinding around the jobsite More cuts per charge – upgraded run time thanks to the combination of brushless motor and longer-lasting Nuron batteries Active Torque Control (ATC) – stops the grinder from spinning if the disc jams Comprehensive safety features – dead-man’s paddle switch, disc brake, soft start and auto shut-off Improved ergonomics – low weight and comfortable balance makes the grinder less tiring to use in any position Applications Cutting rebar, pipes and sheet metal Cutting and grinding concrete, masonry, stone or roof tiles Notching, grinding, deburring and finishing metal surfaces ### TECHNICAL DATA: Rated voltage: 21.6 V Disc diameter: 4.9 in Tool body weight: 4.6 lb. Technical Data | Rated voltage | 21.6 V | Disc diameter | 4.9 in | Tool body weight | 4.6 lb | Max. cutting depth | 1.34 in | No load RPM | gear 2: 9000 rpm | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 11.4 x 3.3 x 5.2 in | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 4.6 lb ### ITEMS- 2270844 - Cordl. angle grinder AG 5D-22-5 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x AG 5D-22-5 Cordl. angle grinder assy - 1x Wrench - 1x Outer Flange - 1x 5/8 D45 Flange inside - 1x Threaded stud - 1x Comfort side handle - 1x 125-P88 Protective cover assy - 1x 5 Clip-on front cover
